clusterList.phrase: the leadership of the anti-war movement was hijacked very early by hard-line communists whose motivation was not a desire for peace but hatred of america

a godsend to both sides the left a once-dwindling band of communists trotskyites maoists and castroists had been clinging to the dregs of a clapped-out cause the islamists could deliver numbers and passion but they needed a vehicle to give them purchase on the political terrain a tactical alliance became an operational imperative
